title: 너야
lyrics:
어느 날부터 매일 아침에
눈을 뜨는 순간부터 설레
아마 내 삶에 네가 들어와 준 순간부턴가 봐
밥 먹다가도 일하다가도
머릿속엔 너만 가득해 이제 자다가도 널 생각해
살아오며 만났던 그 누구와도 비교가 안 돼 그게

바로 너야 내 모든 것
다 주고 더 줘도 아깝지 않은
사람 보고 있어도 보고 싶어지는
사람이 너야 내 모든 것
살아가는 동안에 나의 전부는 너야

영원한 건 없다고들 말해
그러다가 포기하고들 해
그래 나도 별다를 것 없이 지내왔었는데
슬프다가도 웃다가도
아무 생각 없이 가만있다가도
생각해도 너를 생각해
살아오며 만났던 그 누구와도 비교가 안 돼 그게

바로 너야 내 모든 것
다 주고 더 줘도 아깝지 않은
사람 내 사랑
보고 있어도 보고 싶어지는
사람이 너야 내 모든 것
살아가는 동안에 나의 전부는

단 하루도 단 한순간도
살아갈 수 없어 네가 없이는
이런 나의 마음이 얼만큼인지 네가 알아주지
않더라도 괜찮아 난 그대로일 거니까

너야 내 모든 것
다 주고 더 줘도 아깝지 않은
사람은 너야 내 모든 것
살아가는 동안에 나의 전부는
너야

title: 생각들
lyrics:
대체로 불행한 날들
힘 안 들이고 내뱉는 말들
포근하며 차가운 밤들

외면당한 마음의 주인이었던 나

더 솔직하려 해

해가 뜨기 전에 난
잠에 들 거야
Good night

아는 얼굴들 속의 나
좋아 보이네
두 발을 도움닫기하면
하늘에 닿을 수 있었던
햇볕이 길고 따갑던
그 시절 반가운 너

이젠 몰라볼 얼굴이 더 많지만
다들 잘 지내
이 어지러운 생각들 사이에서
난 의외로 너희를 추억해
수없이 많은 물음이,
또 많은 울음이
빽빽한 이 공책
그 틈에서 끝내 여백을 찾아
몇 자를 적어
'모든 것은 여전해'

title: 공병 (Original Ver.)
lyrics:
그대가 앉아 있던 곳


나에게 내밀었던 손


나는 왜 아무렇지 않게 잡지 못했을까

그 틈 사이에


무거운 공기만 가득하네요


해를 먹은 바닷가 위에


저 멀리 파도 탄 빈병이 밀려오기를


조용히 기다리네요


수많은 빛 그 가운데


그대가 보낸 작은 배


내게 와 별빛이 되어 줘요


모래사장 위 그대가


보낸 공병 그 안을 나


보지 않아요 보지 않아도


그대 마음은 보이는 것 같아요

title: Your scent (너의 향기)
lyrics:
Oh oh oh, your scent lingers still
내 맘 속에 (In my heart), can't escape this feel
Memories thrill, time stands still
네 향기에 취해 (Drunk on your scent), against my will

City lights flash, memories crash, emotions clash
네 향기가 날 감싸 (Your scent wraps around me), in a neon splash
Heart racing fast, present to past, how long will it last?
이 밤이 깊어갈수록 (As the night deepens), your scent's contrast

Every corner, every street
너의 흔적 (Your traces), make my heart beat
Can't forget, won't forget
이 도시가 (This city), echoes with regret

Your scent, your scent (너의 향기)
Haunting me, can't set me free
잊지 못해 (Can't forget), your everything
Deep in my soul, tattooed indelibly
다시 떠올라 (Rising again), endlessly

Scent-scent-scent, intoxicating me (Yeah)
향기에 취해 (Drunk on your scent), can't you see? (Oh)
Scent-scent-scent, my sweet agony (Woo)
네 향기 속에 갇혀 (Trapped in your scent), need to break free (Let me go)

Late night drive, memories dive, barely alive
창문 너머로 (Through the window), your scent still survives
Playlist spins, where it begins, the fragrance wins
그때 그 향기 (That scent back then), to break free

In my dreams, in my nightmares
네 향기만 (Only your scent), fills the air
Can't move on, the scent's so strong
이 그리움 (This longing), where do I belong?

Your scent, your scent (너의 향기)
Haunting me, can't set me free
잊지 못해 (Can't forget), your everything
Deep in my soul, tattooed indelibly
다시 떠올라 (Rising again), endlessly

Listen up! Your scent's a riddle (Oh no)
너의 향기 (Your scent), got me feeling little (So small)
Can't stop this, it's habitual (Woo)
매일 밤 (Every night), your scent's residual (It stays)
I'm drowning in this ocean blue (Help me)
Of memories and scents of you (Your scent)
향기 폭포 (Scent waterfall), I'm falling too
네 향기 속에 (In your scent), what should I do?

Scent of you, tattooed and true, what can I do?
지울 수 없어 (Can't erase it), this scented déjà vu
Memories fade, your scent pervades, my heart invades
Forever trapped in these aromatic shades

Your scent-scent-scent, it's my destiny
네 향기 속에 영원히 (In your scent forever), can't you see?
Scent-scent-scent, it's my melody
이 향기가 내 운명이니 (This scent is my fate), set me free
let me free, endlessly
Listen up, Your scent's a riddle
네 향기 속에 영원히 (Your scent) can t you see?
Scent-scent-scent, it's my melody
이 향기가 내 운명이니, set me free

title: 오블리비아테 (Obliviate)
lyrics:
Fading out the pain I hide
Leave the love, push dark aside
Erase the past, I’m free to fly
Obliviate, I’m not afraid tonight

Locked in my head, it’s a maze, I’m stuck
Flipping through pages, the ink’s dried up
Scars in my mind, but they’re just old cuts
Dreams in my chest? They ain’t giving up
Erase it, trace it rewrite my name
No more shadows, I’m done with the shame
Life’s a canvas, paint it bold
Let the hurt go, let the truth unfold

Falling stars, let them guide my way
Wash my heart, bring a brighter day
Obliviate the nights I cried
Leave the moments where love survives

Sing my soul, let the memories fade
Take the hurt, let it dissipate
Only the love, let it resonate
Obli, Obli, Obliviate
Rewrite the song, let my heart vibrate
Build me strong, let me elevate
I’m breaking free Obliviate

Erase the fear, I’m clearing my sight
What’s left behind won’t hold me tight
Tangled memories, I cut the string
Now I’m soaring, hear me sing
Pages burning, I’m lighting the flame
Flipping the script, I’m changing the game
No regrets, no chains on me
This is my story, I’m finally free

Falling stars, let them guide my way
Wash my soul, light a brighter day
Obliviate the nights I bled
Only the love lives in my head

Take the hurt, let it dissipate
Only the love, let it resonate
Obli, Obli, Obliviate
Rewrite the song, let my heart vibrate
Build me strong, let me elevate
I’m breaking free Obliviate

Shadows fall, but I won’t bow
I’m rewriting my story now
The hurt is gone, the love remains
I’m free to run through healing rains

Break down the walls that held me tight
Turn my scars into beams of light
Obliviate, my soul’s alive
Good vibes only watch me thrive

Obli, Obli, Obliviate
Take my soul, let the memories fade
Erase the pain, let it dissipate
Only the love will resonate
Obli, Obli, Obliviate
Rewrite the song, let my heart vibrate
Build me strong, let me elevate
I’m breaking free Obliviate

Obli, Obli, my pain tonight
Stars will guide me to the light
Erase, replace, I’m born anew
Obliviate, I’m trusting you

title: From night to light

I dream of us looking into each other's
eyes and whispering softly

show me all of yourself

talking about out tomorrow

And I dream of us greeting tranquil
morning together, forever

title: Last Night In Chicago (Studio Live)
lyrics:
You even remember? Woodfield Plaza in Schaumburg.
A special place where you came from far away to see me.
That afternoon we went shopping and had coffee.
And you put me in your car and drove down I-90 to Chicago.

We had a hard time with traffic and parking,
but it was all good because we're just together.
I don’t remember what I ate at McDonald’s that night.
That's how my first night in Chicago started.

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

You even remember? Cloudbar at John Hancock Tower.
We went there after dinner. I don't remember what we drank.

A subtle feeling that may or may not be love.
A candle that swayed uneasily like my heart.
The panoramic night view outside the window was dazzlingly beautiful,
but I was only looking at your

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

I don't know why I did that to you back then.
Why did I like you so much?
Why couldn't I hide my feelings?
I didn't say I love you but You probably already knew everything.
On my last night in Chicago,
On my last night in Chicago oh~
Ooooh~
Ooooh~
Ooooh~

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

I was sorry. What I couldn't say then.
I loved you. What I couldn't say then.
It wasn't the Chicago night that I loved, it was you
mmm~

title: Last Night In Chicago
lyrics:
You even remember? Woodfield Plaza in Schaumburg.
A special place where you came from far away to see me.
That afternoon we went shopping and had coffee.
And you put me in your car and drove down I-90 to Chicago.
We had a hard time with traffic and parking,
but it was all good because we're just together.
I don’t remember what I ate at McDonald’s that night.
That's how my first night in Chicago started.

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

You even remember? Cloudbar at John Hancock Tower.
We went there after dinner. I don't remember what we drank.
A subtle feeling that may or may not be love.
A candle that swayed uneasily like my heart.
The panoramic night view outside the window was dazzlingly beautiful,
but I was only looking at your face.

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

I don't know why I did that to you back then.
Why did I like you so much?
Why couldn't I hide my feelings?
I didn't say I love you but You probably already knew everything.
On my last night in Chicago,
On my last night in Chicago oh

It felt like I was being sucked into a scene from a movie.
We drove towards Chicago, listening to music together.
It was a romantic and happy driving time.
An ecstatic scenery that I experienced for the first time in my life.
That night, Chicago, the beautiful city of red lights.
I will never forget that moment that night when I broke up with you until I die.

I was sorry. What I couldn't say then.
I loved you. What I couldn't say then.
It wasn't the Chicago night that I loved, it was you

title: 삼박자 2025
lyrics:
한 시 반, 늦은 아침밥, 강아지와 평온한 시간 .
두 시 반, 아직 춥지만 필수지, 산책. 우리 집 앞.
세 시 반 쯤에 귀가, 어제 찍다 만 거 재시작.
다섯 시, 아직 작업실, 일어나서 기지개와 커피

다섯 시 반, 설거지와 빨랫거리 다 처리한 후
여섯 시, 어쩌지. 여지 없이 위스키병 열지.
일곱 시, 작업실 복귀. 사실 좀 취한 편이 좋지.
아홉 시 반, 또 시작. 혹시 한 잔 땡기면 오시란.

열 시 반, 아직 덜 취한 친구 몇이랑 본격 시작.
한 시 반, 곧 마감 시간. "사장님, 잘 먹고갑니다"
두 시 반, 순대국집 안. 입은 웃지만 눈이 감겨.
세 시 반, 택시 안. Maybe I'm blacking out.

여덟 시, 눈이 떠졌지. 아마 열 시 쯤엔 작업 시작.
열 한 시, 너는 뭘 할지 궁금해져, 나 씨... 미련하지.
열 두 시, 정수기 점검 후 긴 수염 밀기.
너 없이도 걱정 없지. 원위치. I wanted this.

I wanted this, I wanted this, wanted this
I wanted this.
Shit.

title: 삶과 죽음
lyrics:
Pale dawn, an apple falls,
Seasons turn, no right, no wrong.
Death’s a breeze through autumn’s sky,
A quiet song, we live, we die.

Life and death, a fleeting line,
Whispers lost in endless time.
Two sides bound, a single coin,
The dance of fate, we all join.

Storm and sun, fire and frost,
Each one gained, each one lost.
Bound together, a simple truth,
Peace is found in eternal roots.

Life and death, a fleeting line,
Whispers lost in endless time.
Two sides bound, a single coin,
The dance of fate, we all join.

No fear, no rage, no need to hide,
In this flow, let stillness guide.
Dark breath fades, a gentle light,
The dance of life, the endless night.

Life and death, a fleeting line,
Whispers lost in endless time.
Two sides bound, a single coin,
The dance of fate, we all join.

No fear, no rage, no need to hide,
In this flow, let stillness guide.
Dark breath fades, a gentle light,
The dance of life, the endless night.

title: 칠흑(漆黑)[Feat.DASEOL]

어딘가엔 눈물이 고여

누군가 곁에 있어주길 바라며

이렇게 외쳐

아무도 없는 이 공간이

나를 잠식해가면서

내 울음소리만이 이 공간을 채운다

어둠이 나를 삼키려 해

title: 별이 된 왕후들
lyrics:
여흥에서 빛나는 별들-
왕실 품격 지킨 그 이름~
조선의 길에 남은 유산-
오늘도 그 빛 따라가리~

[원경왕후]
태종 곁에 굳건히 서,
조선의 틀 다지네~
그의 꿈을 함께하며,
왕실의 꽃 되리라~

빛나라~ (빛나라) 여흥의 빛.
조선을 지킨 그 마음이여~
이어라~ (이어라) 충성의 길.
우리 가슴 깊이 새겨지네~

[인현왕후]
격동의 물결, 흔들림 없는 꽃,
두 번 피어난 왕비의 품격.
고난 속 굳건한 믿음으로,
조선의 빛 되어 영원히 빛나리.

빛나라~ (빛나라) 여흥의 빛.
조선을 지킨 그 마음이여~
이어라~ (이어라) 충성의 길.
우리 가슴 깊이 새겨지네~

[인현왕후]
격동의 물결, 흔들림 없는 꽃,
두 번 피어난 왕비의 품격.
고난 속 굳건한 믿음으로,
조선의 빛 되어 영원히 빛나리.

빛나라~ (빛나라) 여흥의 빛.
조선을 지킨 그 마음이여~
이어라~ (이어라) 충성의 길.
우리 가슴 깊이 새겨지네~

[명성황후]
명성의 이름, 강철 같은 마음,
침략의 어둠 뚫고 빛 비추네.
나라 지키려 몸 던진 결단,
그 희생과 용기, 역사가 되리.

세월 지나도 변치 않을 그 믿음,
역사의 이름, 조선의 빛이여.
나라 위한 영혼의 깊은 숨,
별 되어 천 년을 비추리라.

여흥의 이름, 세운 유산,
별이 되어 조선을 밝히리~
백성을 위한 헌신의 빛,
천 년을 이어서 빛나리~

음~ 음~~

title: Shine
lyrics:
Every color fades into the white
Like an empty canvas
That's how I feel in this madness
Even though it's not about your surface
I can't deny you have a pretty face
I'm so mad
Cause you're not mine
Falling behind
Losing my mind
How do you shine so bright?
Baby, Shine
Make everything so white with your halo
Like thousands of fluorescent lights on you
Turning the dark into something new
Every moment made me wanna stay
Like it's fancy decoy
That's how I feel in this madness
Even though it's not about your surface
I can't deny you have a pretty face
I'm so mad
Cause you're not mine
Falling behind
Losing my mind
How do you shine so bright?
Baby, Shine
Make everything so white with your halo
Like thousands of fluorescent lights on you
Turning the dark into something new
I can't keep my eyes off you
Please turn off these lights
I just wanna stay for more nights with your halo
Baby, Shine
Shine, Make everything so white with your halo
Like thousands of fluorescent lights on you
Turning the dark into something new
Something new woo-
Baby you're mine
Mine, Never ever gonna fade away
No way
No way, yeah

lyrics:

title: 겨울에 벚꽃이 핀다면
lyrics:
나를 떠났던 널 잊어보려 해
바보같이 또 난 겨울에 아픈데

너와 있던
방안에 남아

손꼽아 기다려도
이제는 의미 없지만

오늘따라 밖에
눈이 많이 내려서

나가봤어 어제는 안 왔던
눈들이 오늘은 쏟아져서

보고 싶어 우리가 해맑게
웃었던 날들로 돌아가서

벚꽃이 폈던 날 헤어진
우리의 얘기는 이제는 뒤로하고

가슴에 상처를 줄 만한
아팠던 말들을 뱉은 걸 용서하고

잘 지내?
물을 수도 없는 내 잘못을 오늘은 후회해

예쁘네
찾아본 네 인스타에 얼굴은 웃음꽃이 피었네

그땐 왜?
꽃 하나 마음대로 쳐다보지를 못했었던 걸까

미안해 한마디가
어려웠던 그때의 내가

이제는 늦은 건가요

다 잊은 채로 앉아
서로를 마주 보다 보면

아픔도 사라지겠죠

내 머릿속이 우울할 때
마다 찾아왔던

너 같은 사람
또 없을 텐데

이번 겨울이 지나면
희미했던 네 모습이 나타날까 봐 자꾸 눈물만 나와

따듯한 밤이야
숨겼던 네 사진 버릴 거야

비밀로 간직한 편지도
백일에 받았던 인형도

어쩌면 내가 바보 같나요?
편히 지내지 못한 게

아직 떠날 준비가
돼 있지 않단 말이죠

맞아
너한테만 얘기했었고

내 비밀들은
너만 지금 알고 있는 걸

겨울에 벚꽃이 피었더라면
널 다시 만날 수 있을 텐데

미안해 한마디가
어려웠던 그때의 내가

이제는 늦은 건가요

다 잊은 채로 앉아
서로를 마주 보다 보면

아픔도 사라지겠죠

버스에 신호를 쫓아가지 않아도 돼
You can stop everywhere
You can stop everywhere
You can stop every time
You can stop everywhere
You can press the button umm

title: Wither
lyrics:
If flowers are only beautiful when they bloom
Isn’t that beauty in itself, I assume?
To wish them lovely as they wither away
Maybe that’s just too much to say
But I was greedy, I wanted it all
For everything to be beautiful, standing tall
If we drift apart with the world in between
I thought, maybe that’s fine, that could be serene
Even a pointless bouquet felt right
You made every cost feel light
But slowly, the meaning began to fade
And spending time with you felt like a charade
You always smiled, but you became like me
We both were wilting, just like the trees
One by one, we plucked our petals away
I told myself, it’s okay, at least we weren’t fake flowers on display
The withered blooms hold my tears in their grasp
Hold my tears in their grasp
Hold my tears in their grasp
Hold my tears in their grasp
Hold my tears in their grasp
(But still, they’ve wilted, despite my clasp)

title: June 16
lyrics:
Who knows? I’m in unrequited love.
You know? she has someone else.
I know it’s wrong. But, out of control.
What can I do? Love

I could never let you know that I love.
I never wanna get dumped by you.
I’m just slowly letting go of my love.
I wish I could have you.

It’s noting but a plea for love.
It’s noting but empty monologue.
I don’t think this love is feasible.
I just wanna see you for a long time.

Who knows why I’m in forbidden love?
I can't explain it to anyone else.
I know it's wrong but out of control.
how can i do? Love

I could never let you know that I love.
I never wanna get dumped by you.
I’m just slowly letting go of my love.
I wish I could have you.

It’s noting but a plea for love.
It’s noting but empty monologue.
I don’t think this love is feasible.
I just wanna see you for a long time.

title: Red glass
lyrics:
In the shadows where the memories linger,

Whispers of you dance like smoke in the air,

A glass of red, it spills like our secrets,

Each drop a story, a moment we shared.

Late nights, the city lights fade,

Your laughter echoes, a haunting serenade,

I pour another, drown in the past,

In this bittersweet dream, I wish it could last.

So I sip on the memories, let them flow,

Like fine wine, they age, but the pain won’t go,

In the dark, I’m lost in your eyes,

A toast to the love that we couldn’t disguise.

The bottle’s empty, but the heart’s still full,

Each swirl of the glass, a reminder, a pull,

Your silhouette dances in the candlelight,

A ghost in my mind, haunting the night.

Late nights, the city lights fade,

Your laughter echoes, a haunting serenade,

I pour another, drown in the past,

In this bittersweet dream, I wish it could last.

So I sip on the memories, let them flow,

Like fine wine, they age, but the pain won’t go,

In the dark, I’m lost in your eyes,

A toast to the love that we couldn’t disguise.

Time slips away, like the wine on my lips,

Each moment we had, now a shadow that grips,

I raise my glass to the nights we forgot,

In this dreamlike haze, you’re all that I’ve got.

So I sip on the memories, let them flow,

Like fine wine, they age, but the pain won’t go,

In the dark, I’m lost in your eyes,

A toast to the love that we couldn’t disguise.

In the silence, I hear your name,

A bittersweet echo, a flicker of flame,

With every sip, I’m drowning in time,

Forever entwined in this love, so sublime.

title: Dreams Across the Ocean
lyrics:
We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Left my home, packed my bags, said goodbye,
Tears in my eyes, but my spirit stayed high.
New land, new fight, gotta find my way,
Hustle every night, grind every day.

Language is heavy, but my voice is strong,
My roots run deep, that’s where I belong.
They see a stranger, but they don’t know,
My fire inside will only grow.

We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Miss my city, miss my streets, miss my sky,
But I’m making this work, I won’t let it slide.
Working two jobs, got no time to sleep,
Dreams don’t come cheap, the climb is steep.

For every no, I’ll find a yes,
Every struggle is my progress.
Step by step, I’m carving my lane,
Turning all my losses into gain.

We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Dreams don’t break, they bend and grow,
Through the highs and the lows, we glow.
This is my life, my grind, my fight,
An immigrant’s story shining bright.

title: Dreams Across the Ocean
lyrics:
We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Left my home, packed my bags, said goodbye,
Tears in my eyes, but my spirit stayed high.
New land, new fight, gotta find my way,
Hustle every night, grind every day.

Language is heavy, but my voice is strong,
My roots run deep, that’s where I belong.
They see a stranger, but they don’t know,
My fire inside will only grow.

We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Miss my city, miss my streets, miss my sky,
But I’m making this work, I won’t let it slide.
Working two jobs, got no time to sleep,
Dreams don’t come cheap, the climb is steep.

For every no, I’ll find a yes,
Every struggle is my progress.
Step by step, I’m carving my lane,
Turning all my losses into gain.

We came across the ocean, chasing the dream,
Building a new life, or so it seemed.
Brick by brick, we rise, never fall,
This is our story, we give it our all.

Dreams don’t break, they bend and grow,
Through the highs and the lows, we glow.
This is my life, my grind, my fight,
An immigrant’s story shining bright.

title: My Cherished One
lyrics:
In the soft glow of moonlight, memories dance in my head
A year's passed since you left, my furry friend, my soul's thread
You were more than just a pet, a confident, my shield
Through laughter and tears, you stood by, never failed

In dreams we reunite, under starlit skies so bright
You run and I chase, laughter echoing through the night
As you know, I will love you forever, through time and space
Our bond, unbreakable, a love that knows no bounds or trace

Cuddled up tight, dreams entwined, as we drifted off to sleep
But distance and fate, they had other plans to keep

As I ventured far from home, your image in my heart did roam
But the days grew shorter, and our time together, a fleeting foam
Then came the news, a shattering blow, you were gone too soon
A void that's hard to fill, so true

In dreams we're reunited, under starlit skies anew
You play and I smile, joy that only we two can renew
As you know, I will love you forever, through every season's turn
In my heart, you'll always be, my guardian angel, my cherished one

title: Phantom Glow
lyrics:
Snowfall kissing windowpanes,
Candles flicker, soft refrains.
Warm arms wrapped in gentle hold,
Our love is timeless, pure as gold.


Crackling fire, the shadows sway,
Blankets pulled tight as we drift away.
Cocoa steaming, hearts in sync,
Time slows down with every blink.
Every laugh echoes in this space,
Your touch leaves an endless trace.
No ribbons, no bows, just your embrace,
Christmas night, our perfect place.


In this season of love, we bloom,
Light up every gray, chase the gloom.
Hold me close through Christmas night,
Together we shine so bright.

Whispers soft beneath the glow,
Dreams we share, let feelings show.
Future bright, as embers gleam,
This night feels just like a dream.

Frosted windows, letters drawn,
Tracing hearts until the dawn.
Fireplace burns, the sparks align,
Your voice soft like vintage wine.
No fancy gifts, no diamond rings,
Just this love that winter brings.
Every breath, a world we make,
Together forever, no hearts to break.


Silent night, our hearts sing,
Every touch, a precious thing.
Wrapped in love, no need for bling,
In this moment, we’re the king.


In this season of love, we bloom,
Light up every gray, chase the gloom.
Hold me close through Christmas night,
Together we shine so bright.


Moonlight fades, but we remain,
Holding tight through joy and pain.
Wrapped in love, no need for bling,
In this moment, we’re the king.


In this season of love, we bloom,
Light up every gray, chase the gloom.
Hold me close through Christmas night,
Together we shine so bright.


Moonlight fades, but we remain,
Holding tight through joy and pain.

title: 지켜줘
lyrics:
밤이 더 깊어질수록 내 맘은 너를 원해

지켜줘 네 곁에서 항상 있길

잊지 말고 약속해 네 손을 놓지 않을래
어제처럼 오늘도 내일도 함께할게
늘 함께 웃을 수 있길 우리 둘이서
영원토록 날 지켜줘

모든 게 빛나 보였던 나날의 기억 속

약속해봐 날 지켜줘

title: In Limbo
lyrics:

(Waiting for you, waiting for you)

I'm lost

title: Before Sunrise
lyrics:
기대하지 않은 날

스미듯이 내게 와

아무 말 없이 손잡고 있는

잠겼던 날 꺼내준 너였단 걸

I’m into you

함께할 수 있을 거라던

매일 기다려 난

이번 주 너에게로 가는 날이 다시 오기만

너와 마주 보는 밤을

내가 다른 그 많은 순간을 가질 수 있게 된대도

바꾸지 않을 거야

하루 종일 걸었던 날에 만났던 노을까지

title: 소심남녀
lyrics:
무슨 말을 해야 하나 그대 곁을 서성이다
맘이 또 참 어려워져 도망치듯 지나치고
한참이나 고민고민 어찌할 바 몰라해도
머릿속엔 그대 생각 종일 온통 그대 생각

괜히 그냥 미안해요 들킬까봐 맘 졸이고
아무래도 안되겠죠 힘없이 돌아서네요
떨리는 내 목소리에 그대 왠지 당황할까봐
아무것도 안할래요 이렇게 바라만 볼께요

운명같은 우연처럼 자꾸 그댈 마주치고
드라마나 영화속의 주인공이 된 것 같아
괜히 혼자 들떠 있다 두근 두근 설레이고
이럼 안돼 이럼 안돼 맘을 애써 추스리죠

괜히 그냥 미안해요 그대 땜에 맘 졸이고
티가 나면 안되니까 난 먼발치가 좋아요
어색한 내 표현으로 그대 맘 어지럽힐까
때가 되길 기다려요 그대 내게 다가 오겠죠

한숨 짓다 끝날 사랑 아니라고 믿을께요
오만 가지 걱정 근심 다 부질 없는 일인데

괜히 그냥 미안해요 자나깨나 맘 졸이고
오늘도 난 바보처럼 또 다시 돌아서네요
한걸음 더 다가서면 그대 나를 밀어낼까
아무것도 안할래요 나 홀로 사랑할거에요
그댈

title: Balloons In The Sky

Reaching up with all their might
But those balloons take flight
Up
Up
Outta sight

Free as birds they fly so high
No map no plan they just try
To touch the clouds kiss the sky

Life's a balloon drifting free
Lose the string let it be
Watch it float gracefully
No worries no decree

Floating over lazy streams

Life’s a balloon or so it seems

[Chorus]

Free as birds they fly so high
No map no plan they just try
To touch the clouds kiss the sky

was more than just one layer

don’t wanna be someone I’m not

was more than just one layer
don’t wanna get used to this
don’t wanna be someone I’m not
I need summer sky directions

title: Endless Growth
lyrics:
I am a spark in the endless night,
Reaching out to claim my light.
Unfolding wings, I rise so high,
The journey calls, I can’t deny.

Every step reveals the way,
A hidden strength in each new day.
With open heart and fearless soul,
I’m diving deep, I’m letting go.

I am boundless, I am free,
A wave in the ever-changing sea.
No limit, no line I cannot cross,
I am endless, I am my own force.

moments that we used to share

the feeling that draws us close

a story we’ve composed?
even if it is

title: Want To Live Happily
lyrics:
There is so much music in the world.
There is also a lot of music that just plays without voices.
There are a lot of songs with voices in them.
Perhaps as many as the number of stars in the night sky?

There are already many songs in the world
A lot of it continues to be made and born out every day.
I also wondered if there was a need for me to make a song.
But I wanted to make songs that I really wanted to listen to.

I want to live happily by making beautiful songs every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day.
I want to live happily by making great songs every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day.

I wanted to find a song that I like among the many songs in the world,
but Since I couldn't listen to all the songs, I decided to make it myself.
Although it is a song that has never existed in the world,
it is a natural and familiar song, as if you have heard it before.
It's a song that never existed in the world,
but it's a song that many people will like from now on.

I want to live happily by making beautiful songs every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day.
I want to live happily by making great songs every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day. every day.

I have to share this joy with my family who love me.
I have to give this song as a gift to my loved ones and their family.
And I'll let everyone know that this song is the work of you and me.
I will cherish our dreamlike moments with this song forever.

I want to live happily by making beautiful songs every day, every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day.
I want to live happily by making great songs every day, every day.
I want to live happily listening to the songs I made over and over again every day. every day.

There are already many songs in the world
A lot of it continues to be made and born out every day.
I also wondered if there was a need for me to make a song.
But I wanted to make songs that I really wanted to listen to.

title: Beyond The Broken Wall Of Time
lyrics:
Know Know Know ooh noo na na na

There you are beyond the broken wall of time
You were chosen by fate,
so never give up.
In one breath, in one teardrop
My heart has been shaken countless times,
and it still is.

I felt like I was losing you,
who I thought was mine,
and my anxiety and worries grew uncontrollably.
I was scared because of my impatience,
but at that moment when time stopped,
I saw the look in your eyes.

I realized the meaning
of the expression on your face.
You said you don't like men who are blinded by love.
At the end of my gaze,
My sadness also flew beyond Dark red sky.
Toward the other side of fleeting time.

All things come to an end,
but I wanted the time
I spent with you to last forever.
It was foolish.
I couldn't control my emotions,

title: Trauma
lyrics:
조금의 책도 잡히기 싫었어
털어도 먼지 하나 나오지 않고 싶어서

내 삶에서 네가 느껴질 때
거울 속 얼굴에 네가 비칠 때

내 모습 참 싫어

서로를 위했지만
방식은 맞지 않아
흉터들이 머릿속에서 터지려고 해

넌 알고 있었나
네 일기장을 본 날
우린 서로의 불행이야

아무것도 남김없이
지나 가지 멀리
타지 않을 버스같이
눈길도 안 줬던 번호들처럼

우리가 만나지 않았더라면
역시,
나았을 것 같지
오늘도 그저 그런 하루를 보내

너 떠오르는 순간
난 과거로 간 듯이 두려워지잖아

모든 걸 내가 지어낸 듯이

단 한마디로 날 무너지게 하지 마

알 수 없는 가벼운 문장을 하나 더
얹어두고서
가난한 마음에 부유한 걱정

음표 속에 담은 날
나보다 살게
영원이게 해

그 어두운 방 안에서 날
기다리고 있었나 봐
이번엔 오래 걸렸지만
다시 이곳으로 돌아왔잖아

음악이란 말이야
유일한 기댈 곳인데
이것마저 나만
제자릴 머무르는 기분

title: 파란 장미(Blue Rose)
lyrics:
어느 날 갑자기 파란 장미를 들고

붉어진 눈가엔 수줍은 미소도

끝인 줄 알았어 너와 나는 이젠 또 너를 사랑하겠지

끝날 걸 알면서도 Blue rose 그딴 게

왜 날 웃게 또 울게

Blue rose 그딴 게 널 떠올리게 헷갈리게

벗어나지 못할 것만 같아

아마도 넌 그걸 아는 것 같아

파란 향기 안에 날 가둬 외롭게

몇 번의 이별은 우릴 시들게 하고

수많은 약속도 다 지워져가고

이제야 알았어 너와 나는 이젠

끝없이 더 원하겠지 끝날 걸 알면서도

Blue rose 그딴 게 왜 날 웃게 또 울게

Blue rose 그딴 게 널 떠올리게 헷갈리게

벗어나지 못할 것만 같아 아마도 넌 그걸 아는 것 같아

파란 향기 안에 날 가둬 외롭게

title: 입술 시간 (Feat. 정인)
lyrics:
조용히 이 순간을 마주 보는 눈동자
여기 짙은 밤은 간지런 웃음 흩날리네
따스히 온몸을 들러붙는 JAZZ & 80's Pop
잔엔 한가득 새콤한 초콜릿 향기

뜨거운 리듬과 가까워진 입술 사이

떨리는 들숨과 닿아오는 순간
만나는 코끝엔 같아지는 온기

두눈 감은 채 조금씩 조금 더 빠르게
왼손 잡은 채 가득히
꿈속 같은 향긋함
품을 안은 채 더 깊이

끌리는 몸짓과 끈적이는 입술 위 땀
맞닿은 입김에 고요히 풀리는 눈동자
넘치는 숨결과 겹쳐지는 시간
만나는 이 코끝에 같아지는 온기

품을 안은 채 더 깊이

우린 뒤섞이며 파도를 타 유영해
우린 지금 아주 보드랍게 유연해
바닥을 구르는 립글로스
다 쏟아진 음료
그리고 무르익는 깊은 소리

title: A Night in Taipei (Feat. Sonny Zero)
lyrics:
Where have you been all my life?
지금까지 어디에 있었던 거야?
A picturesque girl with a lavender sky
보랏빛 하늘 아래 그림 같은 그대

lyrics:

lyrics:
토요일 오후, 나른한 햇살
밝은 정적, 따스한 공기
내가 제일 좋아하는 시간이야
오랜만에 들려오는 사람 소리
간만에 맡아보는 가을 냄새
멍하니 하늘 보고, 구름으로 그림 찾기

커피에 얼음을 넣을까?
선선한 오후, 사소한 고민
눈꺼풀이 자꾸만 무거워져
기지개 크게 펴고
결국 차가운 커피를 마셔
(역시 커피는 아이스)

오늘따라 참 아늑해

벽시계는 벌써 정오
오늘따라 시간도 느릿느릿
(점심엔 뭐 먹지?)
오랜만에 실력 발휘 해볼까
냉장고를 열어보다
결국 서랍 속 라면을 꺼내
(주말엔 역시 라면)

눈꺼풀이 자꾸만 무거워져
내 옆에서 꾸벅꾸벅 조는
우리 고양이랑 같이
나도 슬슬 졸려
(그냥 누울까?)
침대로 가기엔
아까운 가을 오후라서

억지로 잠을 떨치고 벌떡
주섬주섬 옷을 입고 나가
오늘은 낮 공기마저 나른해

봄의 분주함도
여름의 무더위도 다 지나
겨울의 쓸쓸함 오기 전에
푸근한 가을 주말 오후
알록달록 단풍보다
유독 높고 파란 하늘이 더 좋아
오늘 가을 오후 날씨
나도 모르게 마음이 느긋해져

문득 떠오르는 여러 생각
일부러 억누르며
이것저것 쓸데없는 생각으로 머리를 채워
이어폰도 안 끼고 정처 없이 걷다 보니
벌써 세 시

title: Vegetarian`s Dream
lyrics:
In the grey sky wandering hearts in your words
Flowers bloom and start a song of pain hidden in silence
In it, I find life once again.

In the cold harsh world you found the light, flowing like Han River shining bright

We dream the Vegetarian's Dream in its warmth we dwell and gleam,
even the coldest world will be revived through your works, the world comes alive.

Those who walked separate paths alone in your books, together they've grown our hearts, once broken piece by piece, melt within your tails of peace

In the cold harsh world you found the light, flowing like Han River shining bright

We dream the Vegetarian's Dream in its warmth we dwell and gleam,
even the coldest world will be revived through your works, the world comes alive.

The sun rises above the Han's waves
Your name now shines a staring ray
like a path guiding the way in every heart you
always stay

We dream the Vegetarians Dream in its warmth we dwell and gleam, the light you've brought into this world will forever stay as it unfurl

The Vegetarian Dream lives on with your words forever strong flowing like Han River shining bright
Flowing like Han River shining bright.
Flowing like Han River shining bright.


회색 하늘, 당신의 이야기를 궁금해 하는 마음들.
꽃들은 피고, 침묵 속에 숨겨진 고통의 노래가 시작된다.
그 속에서 나는 다시 한번 삶을 찾는다.
차갑고 혹독한 세상에서 당신은 빛을 찾았고
한강처럼 흘러 밝게 빛난다.

우리는 채식주의자의 꿈을 꾸고 그 따뜻함 속에 머물며 빛난다.
가장 차가운 세상조차도 당신의 작품을 통해
되살아날 것이고 세상도 새로워진다.

당신의 책 속에서 서로 다른 길을 걸었던,
그들은 함께 성장했고 한때 조각조각 부서졌던 우리들의 마음은
당신의 평화의 이야기 속에 녹아 내린다.

차갑고 혹독한 세상에서 당신은 빛을 찾았고,
한강처럼 흐르며 밝게 빛난다.

우리는 채식주의자의 꿈을 꾸고,
그 따스함 속에 우리는 머물며 빛난다.
가장 차가운 세상도 당신의 작품을 통해 부활할 것이고,
세상도 새로워진다.

해가 한강의 수면 위로 떠오릅니다.
당신의 이름을 이제 모든 시선들이 응시하고 바라봅니다.
모두의 마음속에 길을 안내하는 것처럼
당신은 항상 머물러 있습니다.

우리는 따뜻함 속에서 채식주의자의 꿈을 꾸고,
거주하고 항상 머물며 채식주의의 꿈을 꿉니다.
우리는 그 안에 머물며 빛난다.
당신이 이 세상에 가져온 빛은 펼쳐져서 영원히 세상에 남을 겁니다.

채식주의자의 꿈은 당신의 말과 함께 영원히 살아남아 한강처럼 밝게 흐른다.
한강처럼 밝게 흐르며,
한강처럼 밝게 흐르며,

title: Endless Love
lyrics:
Under starlight, I trace our hidden love
Your smile, a sweet melody in my dreams

Though tides turn, my heart's fire remains
In the ashes of what once was

"Endless love" I whisper each night
A promise held tight, across life's divide

Each sunset brings your face to mind
A love etched in time, impossible to erase

Stars remind me of my tears
Finding your shadow beside me in the quiet

A promise held tight, across life's divide

If time carries my words to you
Feel their enduring truth

Alone, I nurture our undying love
A beacon in the night, forever strong

title: ME
lyrics:
People in the world are busy
looking for small and close things
because I am alone in search of
something wide and big
it seems to others that I am wandering
through places that are in vain His innate
nature is simple like sea water that
has forgotten even its salty taste and
like a strong wind that comes
from no where and goes no where
it seems to never stop
however I am different from
people because love nature
the mother who gives me water
this is because mother nature
is the foundation of my soul
combine
she is the foundation of my soul
soul
this is because mother nature
is the foundation of my soul
he has the foundation of my soul
soul soul soul soul soul

title: hypochondriac
lyrics:
Am I fooling myself?
My hypochondriac ways
The fever dreams and headaches
That stain my eyes red

Is it cruel of me
to pay for happiness?
A serotonin addict
going through withdrawal

Am I me
without you?
cause it feels too good
too soon
but do I need
to lose myself?
to quiet all the voices

I disappear for a moment
and all i feel is you
you

My endless range
of emotions and
All I want to do is
Come down
Calm down
with you

Scared myself
Found something wrong
Placed my bets
gambling with god
Told me I could use a lil help
to save the best parts of myself

Am I me
without you?
cause it feels too good
too soon
but do I need
to lose myself?
to quiet all the voices

I disappear for a moment
and all i feel is you
you

My endless range
of emotions and
All I want to do is
Come down
Calm down
with you

title: Fantasy
lyrics:
I’m floating on the edge of time,
This perfect place is yours and mine.
No worries here, no fear in sight,
Just endless joy, pure and bright.

If I could freeze this feeling in my heart,
We’d never have to be apart.
I’d keep us here, forever more,
In this place where we soar.

Let me live in this dream, never let it fade,
Where the sun never sets and the sky’s never gray.
In this world of ours, nothing’s as it seems,
But I don’t care, I’m lost in my dream.

But I don’t care, I’m lost in my dream.

title: 새벽유성
lyrics:
고요한 새벽, 칠흑같은 하늘, 너의 얼굴 떠올라 추억의 바다에 잠겨
기억 속 너는 별 별빛 속 너의 미소 잊혀지지 않는 밤 깊은 잠에 물든

길거리 가로등 황홀한 빛 그림자 낡은 사진 한장 추억의 너와 너
마음속 빈자리 채워질 수 없는 그리움 눈감으면 다시 너의 향기 가득한

밤마다 떠오르는 너 새벽 유성 그리움에 잠 못 이루는 내 맘
보고 싶은 너 날 흔들어 깨우네 하늘에 닿을 듯한 새벽의 그리움

커피 한 잔 고요한 새벽 내방 짧은 순간 네목소리 귓가에
말하지 못한 이야기 감춰진 진심 사라진 너의 온기 다시 불러보내

추운 바람 스치면 너의 숨결 떠올라 지나간 속 너와의 기억
비맞은 창문 너의 눈물 흘러 보고 싶은 밤 난 너의 이름 또 불러

밤마다 떠오르는 너 새벽 유성 그리움에 잠 못 이루는 내 맘
보고 싶은 너 날 흔들어 깨우네 하늘에 닿을 듯한 새벽의 그리움

title: Dance Over Books
lyrics:
Dance on books,
Spin through stories,
Words weave magic

Dance on books,
Spin through stories,
Words weave magic

Pages turn, rhythm flows,
In the library, unknown.
Steps and lines, stories blend.

Whispers rise, shadows find,
Corners hide, tales unwind.
Secrets in every book.

Twirl through tales, wherever we are.
Ink and dreams, magically blend,
We dance, we dance, till the end.

title: Was It You
lyrics:
we don’t talk even in morning
ain’t nothing looking lovely
air too heavy in this room
spending hours like I should
it feels like time is slowing
down, even stopped flowing
now we got nothing new
the flame went off, that’s true
now I’m trynna end this better
you said you need my company
so I done gave you everything you need
emotional love, material love, physical love
I committed that part of my life
Imma say I’m done for it, like you expected
now my mind is full of papers, run the checks up
so it’s 6 in the morning,
I’m still in the stu with nobody
this shit feels way finer

Was it you, who said
gon’ stay with me forever?
girl I’d been on the edge
tell me, where’d you been?
now I live different days
that means my life has changed
promise, broken like glass
it’s time to let go
writing this song, yeah it isn’t for you

my deep inside, I was never in secured
situations, but fluctuations
girl you never called me with this urgency
don't even wanna care bout your purposes
I’m livin’ good, makin’ right
with my gang, my life’s movie-like
nothing like the days you tore me apart
since then I’ve been doubting
everybody around me,
now I can't say the love I getting is real yeah
cuz I couldn't know the love I got was lie or not
but thank that I’ll never get lover like you, nah
it was love game from the love affair
it was my bad to play fore I prepared
frosted heart, I became, I like it now
cuz all the pains can’t paint my heart no more

Was it you, who said
gon’ stay with me forever?
girl I’d been on the edge
tell me, where’d you been?
now I live different days
that means my life has changed
promise, broken like glass
it’s time to let go
writing this song, yeah it isn’t for you

title: Playing Pretend
lyrics:
Sometimes I think about my life
and all it’s funny games

I was young again

are just meant to change
Nothings meant to last forever

So where will you be
heard you're leaving town
Won't have much to do
If you're not around
Well I suppose its
better this way

title: Drive For Two
lyrics:
Drivin’ around the city in the night
I don’t have a car, you pick me up on time
This drip coffee is always on your side
I love how you talk about your dreams and days
Playlists set to my favorites
Lately i’m into Tom Misch
I know the way you hear the melody of songs
Cause it runs through me
Sometimes I feel like being alone
But now I have some room for you
No matter how you feel the mood
I’ve got some plans, I made them for two
Can’t deny life is full of woes
But I found reasons why I like you
Mess around on the river
Or just with the fever
Doesn’t matter what comes next
Pull up at the mirror
Make my face sweeter
Call my name then I’ll be there
You smile brighter than the moonlight
I feel better than the cool lime
I like the way you see me
Nothing else matters
You love me, that’s why I’m here
No matter how you feel the mood
I’ve got some plans I made them for two
Can’t deny life is full of woes
But I found reasons why I like you

title: Recollection
lyrics:
Looking back it's clear to see
Moments lost in memory
Echoes of the days gone by
Shadowed by the evening sky


Pictures fade in the light
Soft whispers fill the night
Traces left of what we knew
Old dreams in the morning dew


Recollection
Heart's reflection
Timeless treasure
Love's protection


Times we laughed and times we cried
Stories carried with the tide
In our hearts they still remain
Living in the joy and pain


Gentle breeze and summer light
Dancing stars in silent night
Every smile and every tear
Holds a place we feel so near


Recollection
Heart's reflection
Timeless treasure
Love's protection

title: 내가 만든 노래
lyrics:
조용한 방, 창밖을 바라보며 난 또 누군가

그 생각에 잠겨 오늘도 볼펜을 들었고

불러보는 멜로디 모든 가사들이

널 향한 나의 마음이 묻어 있었지만 별 수가 없어서

난 너만 바라봤었지만

아마 지금의 난 어쩔 수 없어서

아무렇지도 않아, 혼자 끄적인 사랑 노래가

너의 귀에도 들릴 수 있게 된다면

한 번쯤은 날 바라봐 준다면 좋았을텐데

내가 만든 노래 속 한 가사가 흘러 지나가

아직 끝내지는 못했지만 보내줄 테니 들어봐

혼자 듣던 노래 속 한구석에 마음을 담아

해주고 싶은 말을 써 내려가는 내 마음을 넌 알까

조용한 밤 소파에 앉아서 TV를 보다, 너는 어딜까?

문뜩 떠올려 본 네 모습에 가사를 적었고

네가 입었던 옷, 표정과 말투까지 다

기억 한구석 자리 잡은 건 아닐까

영원한 사랑은 없다고들 하지만

그런 건 안 믿는데!

다 기억해 주지 않아도 돼

곁에 있어준다 약속할게

너에겐 가볍게 들릴 수 있겠지만

네게 만든 노래 너가 듣기엔 어때

내 가사들 속으로 들어와 줄래

내 마음 한 켠에 남아 있는

내가 만든 널 위한 노래

한 번쯤은 날 바라봐 준다면 좋았을텐데

내가 만든 노래 속 한 가사가 흘러 지나가

아직 끝내지는 못했지만 보내줄 테니 들어봐

혼자 듣던 노래 속 한구석에 마음을 담아

해주고 싶은 말을 써 내려가는 내 마음을 넌 알까

lyrics:

title: night mare (악몽) (ft. 조이 딕스 주니어)
lyrics:
I wake up in a cold sweat,
with your voice in my head.
I thought it was a bad dream
where you leave me hurt like that
I was begging you not to say good bye,
But you turn your back around,
leaving me behind.

Bad break up, it's like a nightmare,
Everywhere I turn, you're right there
Memories replay like a broken song
in my music box
Your shadow haunts me day and night,
Every moment's filled with fright.
The echoes of our love remain,

Shattered hopes, torn apart,
Your ghost lingers in my heart.
Every moment's a painful twist,
In this nightmare, you’re sorely missed.
The silence screams your name aloud,
In this nightmare, I'm lost in the crowd.
every breath I take, a heavy weight,

The walls are closing in,
while the room is growing too tight,
In this nightmare, there’s no light
to spot where to hide
I wander through this
haunted space
In this nightmare,
I can't find my place anywhere

Your voice lingers in the air,
It is a constant reminder of despair.
No escape from this haunting dream,
But In this nightmare, I silently call out
your name loud in the air

Daylight fades, the shadows grow,
In this nightmare, the pain won’t go.
Every thought, a thorn that digs,
Caught in this nightmare, can't break free.
Day turns into night, and I'm still here,

Thought I was strong, but now I see,
This nightmare's got a hold on me
so tight that I can’t set myself free
Will I wake up from this endless dream?
Where then I can find the light
that lets me see how to escape

In the quiet of the night,
I replay every fight,
Wishing I could turn back the time,
And thus make everything right.
The night time is dragging on, the stars won't shine,
In this nightmare, you’re no longer, no longer mine.


나는 식은땀을 흘리며 깨어나,
머릿속에 네 목소리가 맴돌아.
이건 그저 나쁜 꿈인 줄 알았어,
네가 나를 그렇게 아프게 떠나는 꿈.
안녕이라고 말하지 말라고 애원했지만,
넌 등을 돌리고 나를 남겨둔 채 떠났어.

나쁜 이별은 악몽 같아,
어디를 가든 네가 보여.
추억이 음악 상자 속 망가진 노래처럼 재생돼.
네 그림자가 밤낮으로 나를 괴롭혀,
모든 순간이 두려움으로 가득 차.
우리 사랑의 메아리는 남아 있어.

산산조각난 희망, 찢어진 마음,
네 유령이 내 마음속에 남아 있어.
모든 순간이 고통스러운 비틀림이야,
이 악몽 속에서 네가 그리워.

침묵은 크게 네 이름을 외쳐,
이 악몽 속에서 나는 군중 속에 길을 잃어.
내가 숨 쉴 때마다, 무거운 짐이 돼.

벽이 좁아지고 방이 너무 꽉 차,
이 악몽 속에는 숨을 곳을 찾을 빛이 없어.
이 유령 같은 공간을 헤매고 있어, 나 혼자 버려진 곳에서.
이 악몽 속에서 어디에도 내 자리를 찾을 수 없어.

네 목소리가 공기 중에 맴돌아,
절망의 끊임없는 상기.
이 괴로운 꿈에서 벗어날 수 없어,
이 악몽 속에서 다시 한 번 크게 네 이름을 부른다.

낮이 저물고 그림자가 짙어져,
이 악몽 속에서 고통은 사라지지 않아.
모든 생각이 가시처럼 파고들어,
이 악몽 속에서 벗어날 수 없어.
낮이 밤으로 바뀌고 나는 여전히 여기 있어.

강한 줄 알았지만 이제야 보이네,
이 악몽이 날 꽉 잡고 있어서 벗어날 수가 없어.
이 끝없는 밤에서 깨어날 수 있을까?
어떻게 탈출할 수 있을지 보여주는 빛을 찾을 수 있을까?

조용한 밤속에서,
모든 싸움을 되새기며,
시간을 되돌릴 수 있기를 바래,
모든 걸 바로잡기 위해.
밤은 계속되고 별들은 빛나지 않아,
이 악몽 속에서 넌 더 이상 내 것이 아니야.

가장 아름다운 곳으로

So I can do it for me one by one.
하나하나 내 걸음 맞춰가고 숨도 고르고
Oh, don’t cry

Oh, life is pretty awful oh my friends.
하나쯤은 있어 wonderful thing
기다리면 돼 just one by one

One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one, one by one
One by one

title: 나사가 빠졌어
lyrics:
마당이 있는 예쁜 이층집에
하얀색으로 울타리를 짓고
사랑스러운 강아지 그 옆에
너라는 행복이 있었지

어느 날 이곳에서
네가 떠나가고 나서
그렇게 아름답던 꽃이
갑자기 시들어 버렸어

계절이 바뀐 줄로만 알았던
내가 바보였나 봐
우린 끝났나 봐

It was perfect, but now
네가 없는 곳엔
나사 하나가 빠져있는 듯 해
So I'm falling down
Down down
나사가 빠졌어

하나둘씩 빠지더니
모든 게 무너지고 있어
넌 어디에
Where you at?
있을 때 잘할 걸
사람들이 말하던
그 말을 내가 할 줄이야
네가 떠날 줄이야

It was perfect, but now
네가 없는 곳엔
나사 하나가 빠져있는 듯 해
So I'm falling down
Down down
나사가 빠졌어

It was perfect
네가 내 곁에서 사라지기 전엔
It was perfect
내 하루 끝에 너가 서 있을 땐
It was perfect
난 완벽하지 못해
여기 네가 없을 때
It was perfect
So baby I am now
나사가 빠졌어
